duties_responsibilities.duty: Perform design and drafting services for internal and external customers focused on Engineered Wood Products (EWP) and/or Truss Design used for customer quotes, order material take offs, and manufacturing.
Prioritize and coordinate work to accommodate expedited or special requests.
Schedule truss and EWP order delivery.
Compile placement plans for BMD dealer's customers that convert conventional floor and roof framing material to Boise Cascade BCI joists utilizing a computer aided system.
Make outside sales calls to lumberyards and construction job sites, as required.
May operate and maintain various engineering and/or drafting equipment.
Demonstrate strong commitment to safety, quality, environmental awareness, and continuous process improvement.

education_certification.credential: College Degree or equivalent work experience in related job function.
